alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon, eastern Grady and southern Thomas Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Cairo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Thomasville, Grady Co A/p, Princes Still, Moncrief, Pine Park, Newark, Rocky Hill, Eason, Beachton and Metcalf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
